reviews.review: It can be fun sometimes, but in all honesty, I like it more for the textures and things it gives me in Garry's mod.
bit difficult at first but it's really fun.
I spent most of my time just playing Zombie Escape, and that's worth $20.

Counter Strike Source might not have as good graphics as global offensive but the gameplay is different. It removes the 5 person squad ,and has an all out fight with up to 64 players from what I have seen. I recommend this game not only for its gameplay ,but it also adds content to Garry's Mod.
This is a great fps game, I love it and so far I am kicking da butts in it!

Great game. I personally think CS:GO is better, but it's worth the money.

Продолжение легендарной кс 1.6 и что вы спросите собственно поменялось?Графика изменилась до того что в 2004 году компьютеры не тянули этот шедевр,для меня это лудшая игра в серии физика на уровне,графика удивила всех в 2004,но не сейчас.Сейчас все хотят компы за 60000 и хотят играть в Battlefield 4 на ультрах----->один вопрос,а нах*й?Она не популярна в киберспорте как кс го,но кс,го худшая игра в серии (опять же по моему мнению)её испортили скины оружий раньше мы скачивали их из интернета и устонавливали в папку models,а Valve нашли в этом выгоду и полно людей с рефлексами даунов и реакцами дебилов зато у них 5 ножей и пиздатая m4a1 которой они хвастаються в любое время,и если ты их неоднократно убиваешь они говорят типо:бомж,нищий и т.д поэтому ксс лудшая.Спасибо за внимание!
This is an amazing game and I recommend it to anyone!
Bought it just because Garry's Mod.Played it like 3 times,but I can say that everytime I felt joy of a well-made game.
That noob got knifed!! Have Counter Strike on the Xbox, feels just like it. Love it.

Definitely a fun game! However, because of its age, there are a lot of empty servers and crappy ones with bad maps and game modes. If you want to get the best experience, find a server you like and add it to your favorites.

Honestly a fun game, mindless easy to get a hold of. I'm sure there are competitive servers for those want like to keep it real, I don’t so play in pubs where everyone is just screwing around. In all honesty the reason the game is alive for this long and will probably never die is because of the community that plays this game. All the kids left for CSGO so now its just a bunch of laid back assholes that enjoy joking around that are left playing this game. Sure you get a hacker here and there but with VAC and admins they don’t last long. If vanilla does not do it for you, you can just get new skins from variety of places that are 100% legit and wont ban you because all it is, is a skin. So pick it up, relax, shoot some people and enjoy yourself.

Counter strike is FPS game made by Valve and released in November 1st, 2004. This game is the first game to use source engine. When you start the game, you can see several menus. First is play in online, play in offline, sound checking and options. Many game users say play in online is main point of counter strike source. That’s right. Without play online, counter strike is like food case with no food in grocery store. There are lots of kind of mode to play with people such as prison mode, soccer mode zombie mode or original mode. I usually play soccer mode because it’s really fun. You can move ball by hitting with knife. Also you can eliminate other team by knife. In play offline, you can play with bots who is a system of computer. The maximum number of bot is 40, each side has 20 bots. You can make rule like only pistol or rifle and shotgun. Or just knife. There are 40 original mission maps but you can download other maps from internet. In original mode, there are bomb mission, rescue mission and VIP mission. Bomb mission is a popular mode for people. Terrorists have a bomb and they can set the bomb only A or B site. And counter-terrorists have to stop them. One of the famous map is Dessert. Next is rescue mission. Terrorists have 4 hostages and counter-terrorists have to rescue them. If you hurt or kill them, you will lose your money. Then you can’t buy expensive guns in next stage. Usually expensive gun is good:( Last is VIP mode. If you choose counter-terrorist team, you will be a VIP or regular counter-terrorist. Counter-strike team has to lead VIP to safe zone and terrorists have to make stop them. Terrorists can kill VIP. VIP can have only pistol. Let’s see the game system. This game uses source engine. It is never used before but many people were surprised of this engine. In example, the dying motion of bot is more smooth and you can destroy many stuffs. You can destroy television, computer, window, specially window is break like real. And quality is not bad. Every skins of character and stuff guarantee good high quality. When you are boring of this game, you can change the sounds and skins of stuff and character even weapons! The famous site is called Fpsbanana, it has a lot of skins of games. So you can download the skins and copy to the game. This game was very popular for game users at that time and it is still popular to many people. - See more at: http://www.chsmirror.com/life-2/ae/2012/04/09/counter-strike-source-review/#sthash.wa4z1a36.dpuf
